creditline: Gift of Sue Y.S. Kimm and Seymour Grufferman
description: woman in straw hat and man holding guitar
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
text: Originally published in July 1930 as cover to a songlet of the series Complete Compositions by Nakayama Shinpei, Folk Songs (Nakayama Shinpei sakkyoku zenshū, Min'yō kyoku 中山晋平作曲全集　民謡曲).
title: Design for the cover of the songlet "Flying Island"
